paper_abstract: In this paper, motivated by the definition of coupled fixed point [T. Gnana Bhaskar, V. Lakshmikantham, Fixed point theorems in partially ordered metric spaces and applications, Nonlinear Anal. 65 (2006) 1379-1393], we introduce the definition of generalized fuzzy Meir-Keeler type functions and we prove a coupled fixed point theorem under generalized fuzzy Meir-Keeler contractive condition.
paper_title: Coupled fixed point theorem for generalized fuzzy meir-keeler contraction in fuzzy metric spaces
